title: For All Time
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson For All Time par Jody Wisternoff
Save me
Hard to break me
I might always
Crash and burn
Hold on
Sight's gone
I run
To you

Take me in beneath the waves
Endless nights with you to sail
Over, sight's gone
I run to you
Into the midst of the rains
Mystery catch aflame
Let go of this loss

Remember the love
Once more change

Into the midst of the rains
Mystery catch aflame
Let go of this loss
Remember the love
Once more change

Into the midst of the rains
Mystery catch aflame
Let go of this loss
Remember the love
Once more change

Save me
Hard to break me
I might always

Crash and burn
Hold on
Sight's gone
I run
To you
